# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #7](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#7)

#### Teccam

On Scadriel, the city Elendel is named for Elend. Is Luthadel also named for a notable historical figure?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes.
